resources.string: The email address that you\'ve entered doesn\'t match any account. Please sign up or try again with a valid email.

The email address that you've entered doesn't match any account.

We detected that your mobile device's clock or timezone may be incorrect. This may be preventing you from signing in.

Please check that both the clock and timezone set on your mobile device is correct.
Please ensure you are connected to the internet and try again.
User not found. Please register first.
Please enter a valid email address.
Confirm Password can not be empty
Please enter a valid password (must be 6 or more characters).
Please check your email for the 6-digit code and set a new password.
Please enter your login email address below.
You can now login using your new password.
Email Code has expired. Please try resetting your password again.
Unable to download the application configuration, please check your internet connection and try again.
